<style>
/* FONT IMPORT */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Assistant:wght@400;600;700&display=swap');

/* GENERAL STYLING */
body {
  font-family: 'Assistant', sans-serif;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* CONTENT SECTION STYLING */
.content-section {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  padding: 40px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  margin-top: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
}
.content-section h2 {
  font-size: 2em;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #1a2b48;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #e9ecef;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Story Section */
.story-container {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 1.1em;
  line-height: 1.7;
}

/* OBJECTIVES/RESEARCH GRID */
.objectives-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
  gap: 25px;
}
.objective-card {
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
  padding: 25px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  border: 1px solid #e9ecef;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  text-align: center;
}
.objective-card .icon {
  font-size: 2.5em;
  color: #0A4C6A; /* Professional Teal/Blue */
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}
.objective-card h3 {
  font-size: 1.2em;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1a2b48;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.objective-card p {
  font-size: 1em;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

/* Supervisor & Collaborator Styling */
.supervisor-list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(220px, 1fr));
  gap: 30px;
  text-align: center;
}
.supervisor-list img {
  width: 85px;
  height: 85px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
}
.supervisor-name {
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.1em;
  color: #333;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
}
.supervisor-title {
  font-size: 0.95em;
  color: #666;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
.logo-display {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 30px;
    margin-top: 25px;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 20px 0;
}
.logo-display img {
    height: 50px;
    width: auto;
}


/* DOWNLOAD BUTTON */
.btn-custom {
  padding: 12px 25px;
  font-size: 1em;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
}
.btn-primary {
  background-color: #0A4C6A;
  color: #fff;
  border: 2px solid #0A4C6A;
}
.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: #083c54;
  border-color: #083c54;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

</style>

<!-- Add Font Awesome for icons -->

<div class="content-section">
